title: The Easel of Justice: The Story of Mallory Parker
summary: Mallory Parker, a 64-year-old retired superhero with a passion for painting and instructing, returns to her heroic duties to stop an art theft, restoring peace and inspiring a new generation.
summaryGerman: Mallory Parker, eine 64-jährige pensionierte Superheldin mit einer Leidenschaft für Malerei und Unterrichten, kehrt zu ihren heldenhaften Pflichten zurück, um einen Kunstdiebstahl zu stoppen, Frieden wiederherzustellen und eine neue Generation zu inspirieren.
summaryDutch: Mallory Parker, een 64-jarige gepensioneerde superheldin met een passie voor schilderen en onderwijzen, keert terug naar haar heldhaftige taken om een kunstdiefstal te stoppen, vrede te herstellen en een nieuwe generatie te inspireren.
summaryFrench: Mallory Parker, une super-héroïne à la retraite de 64 ans passionnée par la peinture et l'enseignement, reprend du service pour arrêter un vol d'art, restaurer la paix et inspirer une nouvelle génération.

story.text: Mallory Parker, enjoying her quiet life as a retired superhero, spends her day painting serene landscapes in her studio, feeling peaceful as she instructs a small class of eager learners.
A news report about a stolen priceless painting catches Mallory’s attention. Her old instincts kick in, and she feels a rush of energetic determination to solve the mystery.
Mallory investigates the art gallery from where the painting was stolen. The aura of the empty walls gives her clues an eerie feeling, pushing her closer to the culprit.
Using her connections from her heroic past, Mallory gathers information about the art thief—an old nemesis—and plans her next move, her mood becoming triuphmant as she uncovers crucial bits.
Confronting her nemesis in a dramatic showdown at an abandoned warehouse filled with stolen art, Mallory feels the fire of the epic battle that ensues.
After successfully recovering the painting and handing over the thief to the authorities, Mallory holds a community art show, which has an unexpectedly romantic turn with an old friend.
Reflecting on the week, Mallory repaints the recovered artwork with her students, feeling happy and fulfilled, knowing she has not only restored art but also inspired hope.

ending: As the sun set on Sunday evening, Mallory Parker knew that heroes come in many forms, some with a paintbrush in hand.
moral: It's never too late to make a difference, and sometimes old skills can be used in new ways.
